CSPViolationReportBodyReferrer.summary: The referrer read-only property of the interface is a string that represents the URL of the referring page of the resource who's Content Security Policy (CSP) was violated.

remarks.para: The referrer is the page that caused the page with the CSP violation to be loaded. For example, if we followed a link to a page with a CSP violation, the referrer is the page that we navigated from.

CSPViolationReportBodyReferrer.value:
A string representing the URL for the referrer of the page with the CSP violation, or null.Note that if the referrer is an HTTP(S) URL then any username, password or fragment is removed.
If the URL scheme is not http: or https: then just the scheme is returned.
